<div class="contact-container">
  <div class="contact-left">
    <div class="contact-method-email">
      <div class="method-label">Email</div>
      <div class="email-display">
        <span data-user="imsaichauhan" data-domain="gmail.com" class="email-link"></span>
      </div>
    </div>
    
    <div class="contact-method-social">
      <div class="method-label">Find me (reluctantly) elsewhere</div>
      <div class="social-links">
        <a href="https://instagram.com/imsaichauhan" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Instagram</a>
        <span class="social-separator">â€¢</span>
        <a href="https://linkedin.com/in/imsaichauhan" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">LinkedIn</a>
        <span class="social-username">(@imsaichauhan)</span>
      </div>
      <p class="social-note">I prefer RSS and email over algorithmic feeds, so I may not always be active on these platforms.</p>
    </div>
  </div>
  
  <div class="contact-right">
    <div class="contact-method-form">
      <div class="method-label">Send a message</div>
      <form class="contact-form" action="https://formsubmit.co/imsaichauhan@gmail.com" method="POST">
        <!-- Honeypot field (hidden) -->
        <input type="text" name="_honey" style="display:none" tabindex="-1" autocomplete="off">
        <!-- Disable reCAPTCHA -->
        <input type="hidden" name="_captcha" value="false">
        <!-- Redirect to thank-you page after submit (dynamically set by JavaScript) -->
        <input type="hidden" name="_next" id="form-redirect" value="">

        <div class="field-row">
          <label for="name">Name <span class="field-optional">(optional)</span></label>
          <input type="text" id="name" name="name" placeholder="Your name">
        </div>

        <div class="field-row">
          <label for="email">Email <span class="field-optional">(optional)</span></label>
          <input type="email" id="email" name="email" placeholder="you@example.com">
        </div>

        <div class="field-row">
          <label for="message">Message <span class="field-required">*</span></label>
          <textarea id="message" name="message" required placeholder="Write your message here..."></textarea>
        </div>

        <div class="submit-wrap">
          <input type="submit" value="Send Message">
        </div>
      </form>
      <p class="form-privacy-note">Your message is sent privately. See privacy details <a href="/colophon/#privacy">here</a>.</p>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

<script>
// Email obfuscation - assembles email from data attributes to avoid bot scraping
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  const emailElement = document.querySelector('.email-link');
  if (emailElement) {
    const user = emailElement.getAttribute('data-user');
    const domain = emailElement.getAttribute('data-domain');
    const email = user + '@' + domain;
    emailElement.innerHTML = '<a href="mailto:' + email + '">' + email + '</a>';
  }
  
  // Set form redirect URL dynamically based on current origin
  const redirectInput = document.getElementById('form-redirect');
  if (redirectInput) {
    // Check if we're on production or localhost
    const currentOrigin = window.location.origin;
    const isProduction = currentOrigin.includes('imsaichauhan.pages.dev');
    
    if (isProduction) {
      redirectInput.value = 'https://imsaichauhan.pages.dev/thanks/';
    } else {
      // For localhost or any other origin, use current origin
      redirectInput.value = currentOrigin + '/thanks/';
    }
  }
});
</script>
